txt_en: Our growth depends not on how many experiences we devour, but on how many we digest.
txt_cn: 成长靠的不是经历有多丰富，而是对过往经历的细细品味和领会。
author: Ralph W. Sockman

txt_en: Praising what is lost makes the remembrance dear.
txt_cn: 赞美已经失去的事物，让回忆变得惹人喜爱。
author: William Shakespeare

txt_en: The more we do, the more we can do.
txt_cn: 我们做的越多，能做的也就越多。
author: William Hazlitt

txt_en: I'm not telling you it is going to be easy, I'm telling you it's going to be worth it.
txt_cn: 我不会告诉你这个过程很容易。我只会说，这一切都是值得的。
author: Art Williams

txt_en: Keep a little fire burning; however small, however hidden.
txt_cn: 让心中的火苗一直燃烧吧，不管那有多微弱，不管藏得有多深。
author: Cormac McCarthy

txt_en: Nothing you wear is more important than your smile.
txt_cn: 不管如何穿戴，都不比带上你的微笑。
author: Connie Stevens

txt_en: An aim in life is the only fortune worth finding.
txt_cn: 生活的目标，是唯一值得我们去寻找的财富。
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

txt_en: Promise yourself to be so strong that nothing can disturb your peace of mind.
txt_cn: 对自己承诺：要强大到任何事情都无法破坏你内心的平和。 ​​​​
author: Christian D. Larson

txt_en: We are the hero of our own story.
txt_cn: 我们都是我们自己故事里的英雄。
author: Mary McCarthy

txt_en: Being brave means knowing that when you fail, you don't fail forever.
txt_cn: 勇敢就是知道即使你失败了，你也不是永远失败。
author: Lana Del Rey

txt_en: Nothing great in the world has been accomplished without passion.
txt_cn: 世上没有任何伟业的成就能够离得开激情。
author: 黑格尔

txt_en: Instead of wondering when your next vacation is, maybe you should set up a life you don't need to escape from.
txt_cn: 与其期盼下一次假期，不如创造一种不需要逃离的生活。
author: Seth Godin

txt_en: It's never too late to be what you might have been.
txt_cn: 成为你所要成为的人，永远都不嫌迟。
author: George Eliot

txt_en: Pure love and suspicion cannot dwell together: at the door where the latter enters, the former makes its exit.
txt_cn: 纯洁的爱情和猜疑水火不容：起了疑心，就会丢了爱情。
author: Alexandre Dumas

txt_en: Growth is the only evidence of life.
txt_cn: 成长是生命的唯一证据。
author: John Henry Newman

txt_en: Some people dream of success, while other people get up and make it happen.
txt_cn: 有些人只是梦想去成功，而其他人却起身让梦想成真。
author: Wayne Huizenga

txt_en: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
txt_cn: 成功并不是快乐的关键，快乐才是成功的关键。
author: Albert Schweitzer

txt_en: The world is extremely interesting to a joyful soul.
txt_cn: 对于欢欣的灵魂而言，世界充满了奇趣。
author: Alexandra Stoddard

txt_en: They can because they think they can.
txt_cn: 他们可以，是因为他们相信自己可以。
author: Virgil

txt_en: Instead of wondering when your next vacation is, maybe you should set up a life you don't need to escape from.
txt_cn: 与其期盼下一次假期，不如创造一种不需要逃离的生活。
author: Seth Godin

txt_en: Nothing great in the world has been accomplished without passion.
txt_cn: 世上没有任何伟业的成就能够离得开激情。
author: 黑格尔

txt_en: Never give up. Expect only the best from life and take action to get it.
txt_cn: 永远不要言弃。要永远只期待最好的事物，并为之付出行动。
author: Catherine Pulsifer

txt_en: Life is a pure flame, and we live by an invisible sun within us.
txt_cn: 生命是一束纯净的火焰，我们依靠内心看不见的太阳而存在。
author: Sir Thomas Browne

txt_en: I wish somebody would have told me, that someday these will be the good old days.
txt_cn: 真希望有人能提早告诉我，这岁月有天会变成回忆中的美好时光。
author: Macklemore, "Good Old Days"
